item.title: A Few Good Public Servants: How Great Analysis Inspires Action
item.description:
Description

What is it like to work in public service? Hear stories from the halls of the Obama White House to New York City Hall of how data and analytics have transformed government in the past decade. From your hometown Mayor's Office of Data Analytics to data teams across the country, learn how a growing number of public servants are using data to ignite change in public policy and operations.
item.dc:creator: Kelly Jin

item.title: Keynote: Building a Data Driven Dialogue From Filling Potholes to Disrupting the Cycle
item.dc:creator: Kelly Jin
